meanings.definition: A small European fish of the herring family.
meanings.sent1: The sparlings swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of sparlings near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The sparlings decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The sparlings shimmered like silver coins in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the beauty of the sparlings as they darted around.

meanings.sent1: The sparlings chirped cheerfully in the morning.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a nest full of sparlings in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The sparlings had a playful game of hide-and-seek among the branches.
meanings.sent4: The sparlings' wings fluttered like delicate petals in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The little girl giggled as the sparlings hopped around her in the garden.
